descriptionNullable:
### Context

These files contain web scraped articles from The Hindu Website, Archive News section. The news articles are from the month of February 2021.
Link for website: https://www.thehindu.com/archive/web/2021/02/
This file 1 contains articles from 2872 links.
This file2 contains articles from 2683 links. These articles of both files combined constitute news of 14 days.



### Content
This file 1 contains articles from 2872 links.
This file2 contains articles from 2683 links. These articles of both files combined constitute news of 14 days.
The scraping was done in two parts as it was time consuming and difficult to scrap 5565 links in one go.

### Acknowledgements

This was done as a part of project during an internshp.
title: WEB SCRAPED NEWS ARTICLES
subtitle: NEWS ARTICLES FOR TOPIC MODELING
description:
### Context

These files contain web scraped articles from The Hindu Website, Archive News section. The news articles are from the month of February 2021.
Link for website: https://www.thehindu.com/archive/web/2021/02/
This file 1 contains articles from 2872 links.
This file2 contains articles from 2683 links. These articles of both files combined constitute news of 14 days.



### Content
This file 1 contains articles from 2872 links.
This file2 contains articles from 2683 links. These articles of both files combined constitute news of 14 days.
The scraping was done in two parts as it was time consuming and difficult to scrap 5565 links in one go.

### Acknowledgements

This was done as a part of project during an internshp.
